root.name: The Getaway 3
root.description: A tech demo was shown during Sony's E3 2005 press conference showing off different aspects of London. The video did not specifically state that the game being shown was The Getaway, but it was confirmed later by Phil Harrison.A video shown at E3 2006 confirmed that the game would not only take place in London, but Amsterdam as well. Rumors were going around that Birmingham, England would be included as well.The game was officially canceled on June 4, 2008 along with Eight Days due to "the redistribution of resources and budget" according to Sony's official statement.
